changeSet.author: Arun
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE menu ( id BIGSERIAL PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, description VARCHAR(500), created_by BIGINT, created_at TIMESTAMPTZ NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(), updated_by BIGINT, updated_at TIMESTAMPTZ, is_active BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE );

changeSet.author: Arun
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE action ( id BIGSERIAL PRIMARY KEY, action VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, created_by BIGINT, created_at TIMESTAMPTZ NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(), updated_by BIGINT, updated_at TIMESTAMPTZ, is_active BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE );

changeSet.author: Arun
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE tenant_role ( id BIGSERIAL PRIMARY KEY, tenant_id BIGINT NOT NULL, role_id BIGINT NOT NULL, created_by BIGINT, created_at TIMESTAMPTZ NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(), updated_by BIGINT, updated_at TIMESTAMPTZ, is_active BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE, FOREIGN KEY (tenant_id) REFERENCES tenant (id), FOREIGN KEY (role_id) REFERENCES role (id) );

changeSet.author: Arun
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE tenant_role_menu ( id BIGSERIAL PRIMARY KEY, tenant_role_id BIGINT NOT NULL, menu_id BIGINT NOT NULL, created_by BIGINT, created_at TIMESTAMPTZ NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(), updated_by BIGINT, updated_at TIMESTAMPTZ, is_active BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE, FOREIGN KEY (tenant_role_id) REFERENCES tenant_role (id), FOREIGN KEY (menu_id) REFERENCES menu (id) );

changeSet.author: Arun
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE tenant_role_menu_action ( id BIGSERIAL PRIMARY KEY, tenant_role_menu_id BIGINT NOT NULL, action_id BIGINT NOT NULL, created_by BIGINT, created_at TIMESTAMPTZ NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(), updated_by BIGINT, updated_at TIMESTAMPTZ, is_active BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE, FOREIGN KEY (tenant_role_menu_id) REFERENCES tenant_role_menu (id), FOREIGN KEY (action_id) REFERENCES action (id) );
